author: missirol
body:
backport of #40804

#### PR description:

This backport corrects the choice of DQM/Harvesting sequences used in RelVal wfs for Run-3 Data with an HLT step ("reHLT"), choosing sequences which properly monitor HLT (as opposed to using DQM for "fakeHLT"). Credits to @mmusich.

#### PR validation:

None.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported, please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

#40804

Fix to Run-3 data RelVal wfs in release cycle for 2023 pp data-taking.
title: use `@standardDQM` for Run-3 re-HLT workflows [`13_0_X`]
